message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it holds immense value for you, and I'm confident it can significantly benefit your operations.  I'm initially suggesting a price of $1,100,000. Let me know your thoughts.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. I am willing to pay up to $950,000 for it.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but I believe the product's value is significantly higher.  I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000. This offer represents a fair compromise, reflecting the significant benefits the product will bring to your business.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value I place on the product, I am willing to pay $1,000,000 for it.
